items.title: Alogic 推出 2000 美元 32 英寸 6K 触控显示器 (原标题: Alogic Debuts $2,000 32-Inch 6K Display With Touch Support)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## Alogic 推出首款 Mac 兼容 6K 触控显示器

Alogic 于 2025 年 9 月 5 日宣布推出其 Clarity 6K Touch 显示器，声称这是世界上首款兼容 Mac 的 6K 触控显示器。

### 主要特性与规格

*   **型号:** Clarity 6K Touch with Fold Stand
*   **屏幕尺寸:** 32 英寸
*   **分辨率:** 6016 x 3384 (6K)
*   **刷新率:** 60Hz
*   **亮度:** 400 尼特最大亮度
*   **色彩准确度:** 99% Adobe RGB/DCI-P3
*   **电源传输:** 可为连接的 MacBook 提供 90W 充电功率。

### 触控功能

该显示器的触控功能通过 Mac 驱动程序和配套应用程序实现集成，使其能够像一个 32 英寸的 iPad 一样操作。

*   支持 10 点多点触控。
*   完全兼容 MPP 2.0 手写笔，支持绘图、素描和多种手势。
*   Alogic 表示，它提供了与其其他 Clarity Touch 显示器相同的直观多点触控功能，但分辨率更高。

### 支架设计

附带的 Clarity Fold Stand 允许显示器在直立模式和平面绘图桌模式之间切换，以适应不同的工作流程。

### 价格与上市时间

Clarity 6K Touch 在美国的售价为 2000 美元，预计将于 10 月中旬上市。

### 其他新显示器

Alogic 还同时宣布了其他几款显示器：

*   1800 美元 32 英寸 4K Aspekt UHD 4K Touch (带多种支架选项)
*   1300 美元非触控 Aspekt UHD 4K
*   1500 美元 Edge 5K 显示器 (可选 Edge 双垂直显示器支架)

![alogic clarity touch 6k](https://images.macrumors.com/t/WkAug42bnSfoYq3Y_DXkKaDkw2I=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/alogic-clarity-touch-6k.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Alogic 推出 Clarity 6K Touch 显示器，这是首款兼容 Mac 的 32 英寸 6K 触控显示器。它拥有 6016x3384 分辨率、99% Adobe RGB/DCI-P3 色彩，支持 10 点多点触控和 MPP 2.0 手写笔。该显示器可提供 90W 充电，并配有可切换模式的折叠支架。售价 2000 美元，预计 10 月中旬上市。Alogic 还发布了其他几款 4K 和 5K 显示器。
items.translated_title: Alogic 推出 2000 美元 32 英寸 6K 触控显示器
items.content:
Alogic today announced a 6K display that supports touch-based input, with the company saying that it's the world's first 6K touchscreen that's compatible with the Mac.


The Clarity 6K Touch with Fold Stand has a 32-inch 6K display with a touchscreen. The display has a 6016 x 3384 resolution, 60Hz refresh rate, 400 nits maximum brightness, and 99 percent Adobe RGB/DCI-P3 color accuracy. The display provides 90W of power for charging up a connected MacBook.

With touch integration enabled through a Mac driver and accompanying app, the Clarity 6K Touch can function like a 32-inch iPad. It supports 10-point multitouch and has full MPP 2.0 stylus compatibility, so it supports drawing and sketching along with a number of gestures. Alogic says that it has the same intuitive multitouch functionality as its other Clarity Touch monitors, just with a higher resolution. If you're curious about how the touch functionality works on a Mac, we have a review of the Clarity 5K Touch Display.

The included Clarity Fold Stand allows the display to shift between upright mode and flat drafting table mode, so it functions with any workflow.

Alogic plans to launch the Clarity 6K Touch in mid-October, and it will be priced at $2,000 in the United States.

Along with the Clarity 6K Touch, Alogic is also announcing several other displays, including a $1,800 4K 32-inch Aspekt UHD 4K Touch with multiple stand options, a $1,300 non-touch Aspekt UHD 4K, and a $1,500 Edge 5K display with optional Edge Dual Vertical Monitor Mount.

More information on Alogic's new devices can be found on the Alogic website.
Tag: Alogic

This article, "Alogic Debuts $2,000 32-Inch 6K Display With Touch Support" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 距离 Apple Watch Series 11 发布还有五天：所有传闻汇总 (原标题: Five Days Until the Apple Watch Series 11: All the Rumors)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# Apple Watch Series 11 传闻汇总

根据最新消息，Apple Watch Series 11 将在苹果于太平洋时间 9 月 9 日星期二上午 10:00 举行的“Awe Dropping”发布会上亮相。尽管预计不会有设计上的改变，但内部将迎来多项更新。

![Apple Watch Series 10 蓝色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/G0u-rifxJY1yDZBJF8OnzFSsm8o=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/apple-watch-series-10-blue.jpeg?lossy)

## 关键更新和新功能

*   **更新的调制解调器**
    *   Apple Watch Series 11 预计将配备联发科（MediaTek）调制解调器，支持 5G RedCap。
    *   5G RedCap 是一种专为可穿戴设备设计的 5G 服务，无需标准 5G 速度，但仍将比当前 Series 10 中的 LTE 带来速度提升。

*   **新芯片**
    *   Series 11 将搭载全新的 S11 芯片。
    *   尽管处理器性能预计与 Series 10 相同，不会带来速度上的显著提升，但新芯片可能体积更小，从而为其他内部组件腾出更多空间。

*   **健康功能**
    *   苹果可能会为 Apple Watch Series 11 添加血压监测功能。
    *   此功能将比标准血压监测设备更为有限，不会提供精确的收缩压和舒张压测量值。
    *   相反，它将主要用于监测高血压状况，并在长时间检测到高血压时发送警报。
    *   高血压是一个严重的健康问题，是心脏病、中风及其他健康问题的风险因素。
    *   用户在收到高血压警报后，可以将此信息提供给医疗专业人员进行进一步检查，其工作方式类似于 Apple Watch 现有的心房颤动功能。

*   **其他功能**
    *   鉴于目前传闻的功能相对较少，预计在苹果发布会上还会有一些尚未披露的惊喜功能。

## 发布时间表

*   **首次亮相**：Apple Watch Series 11 将于 9 月 9 日星期二太平洋时间上午 10:00 在“Awe Dropping”活动中首次亮相。
*   **预购**：预计将于 9 月 12 日星期五开始接受预购。
*   **正式上市**：预计将于 9 月 19 日星期五正式上市。
items.shortSummary: Apple Watch Series 11 预计将于 9 月 9 日的苹果“Awe Dropping”活动中发布。设计无变化，但内部将升级。主要更新包括支持 5G RedCap 的联发科调制解调器，以及新的 S11 芯片（性能与 S10 相同，但可能更小）。健康功能方面，将引入有限的血压监测，主要用于高血压预警而非精确测量。预购预计 9 月 12 日开始，9 月 19 日正式上市。发布会可能还有其他惊喜。
items.translated_title: 距离 Apple Watch Series 11 发布还有五天：所有传闻汇总
items.content:
We have just a few more days to go until Apple's September 9 "Awe Dropping" event that will see the introduction of the Apple Watch Series 11. No design changes are expected this year, but there could be some internal updates.


Updated Modem


The Apple Watch Series 11 is rumored to be getting a MediaTek modem that supports 5G RedCap, a 5G service designed for wearables that don't need standard 5G speeds. 5G RedCap should still bring speed improvements over the LTE that's in the current Series 10.

New Chip


Apple has a new S11 chip in store for the Series 11, but it will have the same processor as the Series 10. We're not expecting speed improvements, but the chip could be smaller, providing more space for other internal components.

Health Features


Apple could add blood pressure monitoring to the Apple Watch Series 11, but it's going to be more limited than a standard blood pressure monitoring device. The sensor won't provide exact systolic and diastolic measurements, and will instead monitor for hypertension and send an alert if the condition is detected over time.

Hypertension is a serious issue where a person's blood pressure stays high over time, and it is a risk factor for heart disease, stroke, and other health issues.

After receiving a hypertension alert, an Apple Watch user could provide that information to a medical professional for additional testing, similar to how the existing atrial fibrillation features work in the Apple Watch.

Other Features


Given that there are so few features rumored for the Apple Watch Series 11, there are likely some hidden features that we don't know about yet, so count on some surprises at Apple's event.

Launch Date


Apple will debut the Apple Watch Series 11 at the "Awe Dropping" event at 10:00 a.m. Pacific Time on Tuesday, September 9. Pre-orders could take place on Friday, September 12, with a launch to follow on Friday, September 19.

Read More


More on the Series 11 can be found in our Apple Watch Series 11 guide.

items.title: Aukey MagFusion Ark 带来 25W Qi2.2 充电，配备可拆卸移动电源球 (原标题: Aukey's MagFusion Ark Brings 25W Qi2.2 Charging With Detachable Power Bank Spheres)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# Aukey MagFusion Ark：25W Qi2.2 模块化无线充电系统

Aukey 近日推出了 MagFusion Ark，这是一款创新的模块化无线充电器，支持最新的 Qi2.2 规范，旨在提供更快速、更灵活的充电体验。

## 主要特点和功能

*   **高速 Qi2.2 充电**
    *   MagFusion Ark 能够以高达 25W 的功率为 iPhone 充电，与 Apple MagSafe 2 充电器的速度相当。
    *   Qi2.2 是最新的 Qi 规范，支持磁性吸附，并将充电速度上限提升至 25W，显著优于 Qi2 的 15W 限制。
    *   Apple 计划在 iOS 26 中引入 Qi2.2 支持，预计即将发布的 iPhone 17 系列将原生支持此技术。

*   **6 合 1 模块化设计**
    *   该系统采用独特的 6 合 1 设计，包含一个主底座和三个可拆卸的移动电源球。
    *   底座本身可为多达三个设备充电。
    *   加上三个移动电源球，总共提供六个充电点，所有充电点均支持 Qi2.2 速度，非常适合多成员家庭使用。

*   **多功能可拆卸移动电源球**
    *   **充电与供电：** 当球体停靠在底座上时，它们可以从底座充电，同时也能为放置在其上的设备提供充电。
    *   **独立移动电源：** 从底座移除后，每个球体都可作为独立的 6,700mAh 移动电源使用。
    *   **双向充电：** 每个球体还配备一个 PD 3.0 30W USB-C 端口，支持双向充电，增加了其通用性。
    *   **散热系统：** 内置主动冷却系统，有效防止设备过热。
    *   **磁性支架：** 球体还兼作磁性支架，方便用户在 FaceTime 通话、观看视频等场景中使用。

## 产品配置与上市信息

*   旗舰版 MagFusion Ark 将包含一个底座和三个移动电源球。
*   Aukey 还将提供单设备和双设备底座选项，移动电源球可单独购买，以满足不同用户的需求。
*   目前 Aukey 尚未公布 MagFusion Ark 的具体价格。
*   该产品预计将于 2026 年第一季度正式上市。

## 产品图片

![Aukey MagFusion Ark](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_gmqA_lSiZ9cGsx8YXkTJHQp6No=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/aukey-magfusion-ark.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Aukey 推出了 MagFusion Ark，这是一款支持 25W Qi2.2 充电的模块化无线充电器。它采用 6 合 1 设计，包含一个底座和三个可拆卸的 6,700mAh 移动电源球，共提供六个 Qi2.2 充电点。球体可独立作为移动电源，并支持 PD 3.0 30W USB-C 双向充电。该产品配备主动冷却系统，并可作为磁性支架。Aukey MagFusion Ark 预计于 2026 年第一季度上市。
items.translated_title: Aukey MagFusion Ark 带来 25W Qi2.2 充电，配备可拆卸移动电源球
items.content:
Aukey today introduced the MagFusion Ark, a modular wireless charger that supports the faster Qi2.2 specification. The MagFusion Ark can charge an iPhone at up to 25W, matching the speed of Apple's MagSafe 2 chargers when paired with an ‌iPhone‌ that supports Qi2.2. For those unfamiliar with Qi2.2, it is the newest Qi specification that supports magnetic attachment and charging speeds up to 25W, an improvement over the 15W limitation of Qi2.


MagFusion Ark has a 6-in-1 design that includes a base that can charge up to three devices and three detachable power bank spheres for a total of six charging points. All six of the charging spots support Qi2.2 speeds, and Aukey says it is an ideal charger for multi-person households.

When docked, the spheres can recharge from the base while also charging devices that are placed on them, and when removed from the base, they function as 6,700mAh power banks. Each sphere also includes a PD 3.0 30W USB-C port for bidirectional charging, and they have an active cooling system to prevent overheating. The spheres also serve as a magnetic stand for FaceTime calls, videos, and more.

The flagship MagFusion Ark will ship with the base and three spheres, but there will also be one-device and two-device base options, with spheres that can be purchased separately.

Aukey has not provided details on the MagFusion Ark's price, but more detail will be available when it launches in the first quarter of 2026.

Apple is implementing Qi2.2 support in iOS 26, and the upcoming iPhone 17 models should support the technology from day one.
Tag: Aukey

This article, "Aukey's MagFusion Ark Brings 25W Qi2.2 Charging With Detachable Power Bank Spheres" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 今天Apple Arcade新增了这些游戏 (原标题: These New Games Were Added to Apple Arcade Today)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# Apple Arcade新增游戏

2025年9月4日，Apple Arcade服务新增了三款游戏，其中包括两款备受关注的NFL和Jeopardy!主题游戏。

## 新增游戏详情

1.  **NFL Retro Bowl '26**
    *   **特点：** 这款游戏恰逢NFL新赛季开始，拥有真实的NFL球员和阵容，并采用复古风格设计。
    *   **新功能：** 今年的版本引入了全新的“Retro Bowl冠军排行榜”，玩家可以根据NFL赛程，在每周的比赛中相互竞争。
    *   **图片：**
        ![Apple Arcade NFL Retro 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EBwXOHc0pZQMyBbzux1Ho12gUng=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Apple-Arcade-NFL-Retro-26.jpg?lossy)

2.  **Jeopardy! Daily**
    *   **特点：** 这款游戏将深受喜爱的问答节目《Jeopardy!》带到了Apple Arcade平台。
    *   **兼容设备：** 玩家可以在iPhone、iPad、Mac、Apple TV和Apple Vision Pro上体验。
    *   **图片：**
        ![Apple Arcade Jeopardy](https://images.macrumors.com/t/msVZXLS75WiZv9Ca0tPOHjKVEx4=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Apple-Arcade-Jeopardy.jpg?lossy)

3.  **My Talking Tom Friends+**
    *   **特点：** 这款游戏允许孩子们照顾虚拟宠物，并进行更多互动。

## 关于Apple Arcade

*   **服务性质：** Apple Arcade是一项订阅服务，提供数百款游戏。
*   **平台支持：** 可在iPhone、iPad、Mac、Apple TV和Apple Vision Pro上访问。
*   **游戏体验：** 所有游戏均无广告，也无应用内购买。
*   **订阅费用：** 在美国，Apple Arcade每月费用为6.99美元。
*   **捆绑服务：** 该服务也包含在所有Apple One套餐中。
*   **访问方式：** 用户可以通过App Store和新的Apple Games应用访问Apple Arcade。
items.shortSummary: 2025年9月4日，Apple Arcade新增三款游戏：NFL Retro Bowl '26、Jeopardy! Daily和My Talking Tom Friends+。NFL Retro Bowl '26拥有真实NFL球员和每周排行榜；Jeopardy! Daily将经典问答节目带到多平台；My Talking Tom Friends+则让孩子照顾虚拟宠物。Apple Arcade是无广告、无内购的订阅服务，每月6.99美元，可在多种Apple设备上体验。
items.translated_title: 今天Apple Arcade新增了这些游戏
items.content:
Three more games were added to Apple Arcade today, including new NFL and Jeopardy! titles.


Just in time for the start of the upcoming NFL season today, NFL Retro Bowl '26 features authentic NFL players and rosters with retro styling. In this year's version of the game, there is a new Retro Bowl Championship Leaderboard that tasks players with competing against each other in weekly matchups, in line with the NFL schedule.

Jeopardy! Daily brings a version of the beloved quiz show to Apple Arcade across the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple TV, and Apple Vision Pro.


The third game added to Apple Arcade today is My Talking Tom Friends+, which lets kids care for virtual pets and more.

Apple Arcade is a subscription service that provides access to hundreds of games across the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple TV, and Apple Vision Pro. All of the games are free of ads and in-app purchases. In the U.S., Apple Arcade costs $6.99 per month, and it is also bundled with other Apple services in all Apple One plans.

Apple Arcade can be accessed through the App Store, and in the new Apple Games app.
Tag: Apple Arcade

items.title: 安克新款Prime充电器配备智能显示屏，实时显示充电状态 (原标题: Anker's New Prime Chargers Feature Smart Displays Showing Real-Time Charging Stats)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
安克创新公司（Anker Innovations）于2025年9月4日宣布推出Anker、Eufy和Soundcore品牌下的一系列新品。这些新产品涵盖了智能充电设备、智能家居解决方案以及音频娱乐系统。

### Anker Prime系列充电产品

Anker Prime系列引入了一系列配备AnkerSense View智能显示屏的充电选项。该显示屏能提供实时充电速度和温度等详细信息。

*   **Prime 300W移动电源**：
    *   这是安克首款最大输出功率达300W的充电器，可同时为三台设备（包括两台笔记本电脑和一部智能手机）供电。
    *   容量为26,250mAh。
    *   可通过两根独立的140W USB-C线缆和电源适配器以高达250W的速度充电，或使用150W充电底座充电。
    ![Anker Prime 300W移动电源](https://images.macrumors.com/t/VvaszjB-kqY9VIz1305se1O3qQM=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/anker-prime-300w.jpg?lossy)

*   **Prime 160W多端口充电器**：
    *   安克称其为“全球最紧凑的160W多端口充电器”。
    *   可同时为一台笔记本电脑、一台平板电脑和一部手机充电，160W功率通过三个USB-C端口分配。
    ![Anker 160W充电器](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1RYgzdBtWx0bNkGkqQrj31Z43r8=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/anker-160w-charger.jpg?lossy)

*   **Prime 3合1无线充电站**：
    *   支持Qi2.2 25W充电，配备主动散热和内置显示屏。

*   **Prime扩展坞**：
    *   支持三显示器输出，提供稳定的8K分辨率。
    ![Anker扩展坞](https://images.macrumors.com/t/qr4DJFiJ9Vl48tjjFERlTg1g1co=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/anker-dock.jpg?lossy)

Anker的充电产品将于9月下旬开始上市。
    ![Anker充电器主图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CingqZKhGCRjf3eliUuL_BGB_8E=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/anker-charger-main.jpg?lossy)

### Eufy智能家居产品

*   **Robot Vacuum Omni S2扫地机器人与Marswalker爬楼载具**：
    *   Omni S2配备AeroTurbo深度清洁系统，可清除地毯和毛毯上的污垢、宠物毛发和碎屑；HydroJet 2.0系统则通过恒定下压力和自清洁拖布用于清洁硬地板。
    *   Marswalker是一款爬楼载具，可让Omni S2等扫地机器人爬楼梯。
    *   该机器人技术将于2025年末在欧洲推出，并于2026年1月扩展到世界其他地区。
    ![Eufy Omni S2和Marswalker](https://images.macrumors.com/t/QnRioQ2LDqGliPXmmP2m2RwVxLc=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/eufy-omni-s2-marswalker.jpg?lossy)

*   **Eufy AI Core**：
    *   一款为家庭设计的全新AI智能代理，能够检测和预测100多种场景，如包裹递送或陌生人接近，以增强Eufy安全生态系统。
    *   将于今年晚些时候推出。

*   **EufyCam S4**：
    *   结合了4K固定镜头和双2K平移-倾斜-变焦镜头，提供全景覆盖和15米范围内的面部细节。
    *   售价299美元，即日起可预订。
    ![EufyCam](https://images.macrumors.com/t/wHUVm_xJBuj-DrU6Fpo_SklKnz0=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/eufycam.jpg?lossy)

### Soundcore音频与娱乐产品

*   **Nebula X1 Pro移动影院站**：
    *   配备三激光光学引擎，支持杜比视界（Dolby Vision）和杜比全景声（Dolby Atmos）空间音效。
    *   安克旗下的Nebula产品线现已并入Soundcore品牌。
    *   X1 Pro将于9月23日在Kickstarter上发布。

*   **AI语音记录器**：
    *   一款可夹在衣物上的设备，能将对话转换为文字记录。
    *   计划于今年晚些时候发布。
items.shortSummary: 安克创新发布了Anker、Eufy和Soundcore品牌下的多款新品。Anker Prime系列充电器配备智能显示屏，包括300W移动电源和160W多端口充电器。Eufy推出了Omni S2扫地机器人、Marswalker爬楼载具、Eufy AI Core和EufyCam S4安防摄像头。Soundcore则发布了Nebula X1 Pro移动影院站和AI语音记录器。大部分产品将于9月下旬或今年晚些时候陆续上市。
items.translated_title: 安克新款Prime充电器配备智能显示屏，实时显示充电状态
items.content:
Anker Innovations today introduced several upcoming products under its Anker, Eufy, and Soundcore brands. The new Anker Prime lineup features a series of charging options equipped with the AnkerSense View, a smart display that provides details like real-time charging speed and temperature.


The Prime line includes Anker's first charger with a 300W maximum output that can power three devices simultaneously, including two laptops and a smartphone. The 26,250mAh Prime 300W Power Bank can recharge at up to 250W with two separate 140W USB-C cables and power adapters, or with a 150W charging base.


According to Anker, its new Prime Charger is the "world's most compact 160W multi-port charger." It can charge a laptop, tablet, and phone at the same time, splitting the 160W across three USB-C ports.


Anker has a new 3-in-1 Prime Wireless Charging Station that supports Qi2.2 25W charging with active cooling and a built-in display, plus a Prime Docking Station that supports three displays with stable 8K output. Anker's charging options will be available starting later in September.


Under the Eufy Brand, Anker announced the Robot Vacuum Omni S2 and the Marswalker, a stair-climbing carrier that allows robot vacuums like the Omni S2 to climb stairs. The Omni S2 has an AeroTurbo deep cleaning system to remove dirt, pet hair, and debris from carpets and rugs, and there is a HydroJet 2.0 system with constant downward pressure and a self-cleaning pad for mopping hard floors. The new robot technology will launch in late 2025 in Europe, and will expand to the rest of the world in January 2026.


Eufy AI Core is a new AI agent created for the home. It can detect and anticipate more than 100 scenarios like package deliveries or a stranger approaching to improve the Eufy Security ecosystem. There is a new EufyCam S4 that combines a 4K fixed lens with dual 2K pan-tilt-zoom lenses for panoramic coverage and facial detail from up to 15 meters away. The $299 EufyCam S4 is available for pre-order today, while AI Core is rolling out later this year.


Under its Soundcore brand, Anker unveiled the Nebula X1 Pro, a mobile theater station with a triple-laser optical engine for Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos spatial sound. Anker's Nebula products used to be under a separate brand, but are being added to Soundcore. The X1 Pro is set to launch on Kickstarter on September 23. Later this year, Anker plans to release the AI Voice Recorder, a device that clips to clothing and can turn conversations into transcripts.
Tag: Anker
